title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Monday 23 October 2017 - BBC News
summary: arrest made over elderly woman 's death .
bells rung in ypres to honour war heroes .

documents.title: murder arrest over care home death
text: murder arrest over care home death

documents.title: badoo meet-up murderers jailed for life
text: badoo meet-up murderers jailed for life

documents.title: our live coverage has ended
text: regular live coverage on this page has ended for the day , but breaking news , sport and travel updates will continue appear through the night .
east midlands live returns from 08:00 tomorrow morning .

documents.title: new foxes boss will have player 'respect '
text: leicester city captain wes morgan has told the bbc whoever the club chooses as their new manager will have the `` utmost respect '' from the players .
he said `` it 's not for me to say '' when asked about michael appleton 's chances of getting the job .
the caretaker manager guided the foxes to their first away win of the season away on saturday after craig shakespeare was sacked last week .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: a note penned by rock icon sells for thousands at auction
text: a note written 50 years ago by rock and roll icon jimi hendrix has sold for thousands of pounds at auction - almost doubling its estimate .
in 1967 anthea connell , from west bridgford , met hendrix at a gig in lincolnshire .
he handed her the note written on the back of a guitar strings packet .
the note which said , `` to anthea .
love and kisses to you forever .
i wish i could really talk to you '' , sold for £ 5,700 .
anthea is using the money to visit family in new zealand .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby : kitto departs tigers early
text: scrum-half jono kitto has been released from his contract at leicester tigers .
the 25-year-old made 29 appearances and scored two tries for tigers following a move from club rugby in new zealand during the summer of 2015 .
after a short spell on loan at worcester warriors last month , he has now been released by tigers .

jono has been part of the first-team squad for the last couple of seasons and we thank him for his commitment to the club , but we have two good scrum-halves coming through the system here and believe the time is right to provide opportunities for them to gain experience in the senior environment . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: woman found dead at care home
text: an elderly woman found dead in the thurnby lodge area of leicester was at a care home , it has been confirmed .
police investigations have been continuing at thurn court care home today while they continue to question a 56-year-old woman who was arrested on sus of murder .
leicestershire county care and thurn court are fully co-operating with the police and other authorities while the investigation continues . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: peaty wins at manchester international
text: olympic swimming champion adam peaty proves he is on good form after the world championships with a comfortable win in the 100m breaststroke at the manchester international swim meet at the weekend .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: appeal to find dog that 'will die ' without treatment
text: there 's concern for the well being of a ginger pomeranian dog that was taken to a vet in long eaton with a serious hernia .
ashfield house was told the dog - checked in under the name frankie and like the one below - had been hit by a car when she was brought last week .
but an examination found the dog actually had a serious hernia , which is so severe that her intestines were coming out of her body .
plans were made to operate but the next day three men collected the dog saying they were taking her to a cheaper vets .
the veterinary practice where the dog was supposed to be going has not received the dog , prompting the rspca to investigate .
we are very concerned about the dog as she was very poorly and she urgently needs treatment .
we do n't know where she is at all , we have made enquiries but we have not been able to find the dog .
the poor dog will die if she does not get any treatment . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: boss rowett expects more from derby
text: boss rowett expects more from derby

documents.title: ypres bells ring at centenary ceremony
text: ypres bells ring at centenary ceremony

documents.title: newark homes still without power
text: around 70 homes are still without power after a failure in newark which happened at about 11:00 .
western power distribution says it hopes to have everything back to normal in the next hour .
we 're sorry to customers affected by the # powercut in # newark # ng23 area .
we estimate that all customers will have power restored by 17.00 .
h , i at present we have 2 properties without supply .
kay
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sir john peace named as university chancellor
text: the lord lieutenant of nottinghamshire has been named as the new chancellor for nottingham trent university .
sir john peace is also chairman of the fashion brand burberry and midlands engine and is trustee of the djanogly city academy in gregory boulevard .
he was previously chairman of the board of governors at the university .
sir john said : the university has much to be proud of and makes a hugely important contribution to the ongoing growth and cultural development of the region . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police to put on extra patrols for halloween
text: derbyshire police are doubling the number of officers they have on patrol over halloween .
it follows anti-social behaviour in allestree last year when cars were damaged , residents were assaulted and eggs were thrown at passing cars .
shops have been asked to limit sales of eggs and flour to under 16s .
insp lauren woods told the bbc behaviour like that `` is not going to be tolerated '' this year .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police appeal over missing lincoln woman
text: police are appealing for help in finding a 26-year-old woman from lincoln who 's been missing for over a week .
kimberley reynolds was last seen when she left her home on witham bank at about midday on friday 13 october .
it 's thought she could currently be in the nottingham area .
police are asking for her to get in touch to let them and her family know she 's safe and well .
anyone with information about her whereabouts is also being asked to contact police .

documents.title: crash on a42 causing delays
text: there 's 1 lane ( of 2 ) closed + long delays on # a42 northbound nr # packington , btwn # b5006 + # a511 , due to a collision .
@ twitterid at scene
rear-ender between two lorries - i was passing the rear lorry as it happened , hope everyone is okay !
hi thanks for your concern .
luckily no-one was injured
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: badoo murderers jailed for life
text: two men have been jailed for life after murdering a man in shepshed .
mark law , 20 , from sandringham rise , shepshed , who pleaded guilty to the murder of tim smith at leicester crown court last month , was ordered to serve a minimum of 19 years in prison .
mason casey , 18 , also from ludlow place , shepshed , was convicted of murder following a trial at the same court earlier this month .
he was ordered to serve at least 15 years .
mr smith was found injured inside a car , which had crashed into a wall on the gelders hall industrial estate , in march .
the 45-year-old died at the scene , and a post-mortem examination later revealed he died of a stab wound to the heart .
mr smith had arranged to meet law on the dating-focused social networking app badoo .
after up both law and casey , he drove to the industrial estate where he was stabbed .
law and casey then left the scene and mr smith attempted to drive out of the car park but collided with the wall .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: five in court after van thefts and burglary
text: four men and a woman have appeared in court charged with `` conspiring to steal from another '' after van thefts and a burglary , derbyshire police said .

the force said the charges relate to thefts from vans in alvaston , chaddesden and barnsley and a burglary at an industrial unit in wirksworth , which are alleged to have occurred in a two-week spell between september 29 and october 13 .

one man was remanded in custody , three men were released under conditional bail and the woman was released on unconditional bail following their appearance at southern derbyshire magistrates ' court on 14 october .
all five will next appear at derby crown court on monday , november 13 .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: missing teenager laila bieeu found
text: officers searching for missing laila bieeu say she has been found .
the 13-year-old went missing from thorneywood yesterday afternoon .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : bells cast in loughborough rung in belgium
text: here are the eight church bells which rang in belgium at the weekend .
they were specially cast at the john taylor & co foundry in loughborough to honour world war one victims .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hendrix 's note to teen fetches £ 5,700
text: hendrix 's note to teen fetches £ 5,700

documents.title: woman injured in three-vehicle a1 crash
text: a woman has suffered minor injuries after a three-vehicle crash on the a1 near markham moor .
nottinghamshire police said they were called at about 11:45 .
the road is open but there are still some delays .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: former colliery site to be turned into housing development
text: planning permission has been granted for about 800 homes to be built at the former thoresby colliery near mansfield .
redevelopment plans also include 250,000 sq foot of employment space .
the 450-acre site will include a retirement village , a primary school , a business park , leisure facilities , and a 300-acre country park .
it is expected to create up to 500 jobs and the first phase will see 150 homes on sale by the end of next year .
however , property regeneration firm the harworth group which bought the site in 2015 , said the whole project might not be finished for a decade .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: multi-vehicle crash causing long delays
text: this crash involving several vehicles happened about an hour ago
traffic stopped for recovery of vehicles involved in collision # a1 northbound btwn # a57 ( # markhammoor ) + # b6387 ( # elkesley ) will update asap
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: paralysed woman completes great south run
text: in the last couple of hours melton mowbray 's claire lomas has finished the great south run after walking through the night .
the former horse rider is paralysed from the chest down but was able to walk the 10 miles using a specialist suit .
she started the race at 10:00 on sunday morning and has walked through the night to complete the course in 24 hours .
she has since posted on twitter : `` thanks to all my team , people helping me and donating . ''
she has done it !
congratulations to the awe inspiring @ twitterid # 10in24
hi there - do you mind if we use this clip on bbc leicester 's facebook page with a credit ?

a truly amazing and inspirational lady @ twitterid x

BBC Local Live

documents.title: missing teen boys 'may have returned to worksop '
text: officers believe two teenage boys who have been missing for almost a week may have returned to worksop .
judge oliver , 13 , and kyle scott , 14 , were last seen at worksop railway station catching a train to sheffield at about 17:00 on tuesday .
it 's thought judge and kyle then caught a train to birmingham before returning to the town at the weekend .
judge was last seen wearing a black nike puffa jacket , grey nike tracksuit bottoms , grey and black nike trainers with a black nike backpack and black nike cap .
kyle was wearing a black nike tracksuit top , green tracksuit bottoms and a black cap .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: young players need time - warburton
text: young players need time - warburton

documents.title: power cut in newark
text: this is affecting more than 350 properties in the ng23 area .
we are aware of a # powercut in the # newark # ng23 and surrounding area .
we aim to restore all supplies by 13:00 .
andi .

documents.title: witness appeal after man attacked with broken bottle
text: cctv footage has been released after a man was assaulted during a robbery in nottingham .
nottinghamshire police said a 31-year-old man was attacked when two men approached him and demanded his personal belongings .
the victim refused and was then attacked with a broken bottle .
warning : third party content may contain adverts .
a bank card belonging to the victim was used in a supermarket in long row later that day .
it happened in st mary 's gate on 18 august at about 05:00 .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man dies in head-on crash
text: a man has died and a second has suffered serious injuries after a head-on crash just outside new whittington .
the two cars hit each other on whittington road just after 17:00 yesterday .
the driver of one car , a 30-year-old man , was pronounced dead at the scene .
a 72-year-old man , who was driving the other car , was taken by air ambulance to hospital in sheffield where he remains in a critical condition .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ypres ' english bells ring out at ceremony
text: ypres ' english bells ring out at ceremony

documents.title: craigslist sales of cocaine and stolen passports exposed
text: secret filming shows how an undercover bbc reporter was able to buy class a drugs listed on the website craigslist .
jonathan gibson bought cocaine from a dealer in derby , illegal cigarettes from men in corby and carlisle , and was offered a stolen passport from a man in chatham , kent .
such items are supposedly prohibited from being offered in classified advertisements on the site .
craigslist was contacted by the bbc but has declined to comment .
see this story in full on bbc inside out west midlands at 19:30 on bbc one on monday 23 october , or via iplayer for 30 days afterwards .
author: BBC Inside Out

documents.title: 'moo-ral ' marks nature reserve entrance
text: a new mural has been created in leicester marking one of the entrances into aylestone meadows .
the mural features some of the animal life that can be seen on the meadows like longhorn cattle , hares , ducks and dragonflies .
it was designed and created by local artist leigh drummond .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cyclist knocked from his bike
text: an investigation has been launched after a cyclist was knocked off his bicycle .
nottinghamshire police said a black hatchback car was believed to be involved .
the cyclist suffered minor injuries .
it happened in crown farm way near bellamy island in mansfield on 14 october but police have only just released details .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : steel wins great south run
text: loughborough runner gemma steel was crowned the winner of the women 's race in the great south run over the weekend .
the 31-year-old finished the 10 mile challenge in 55 minutes and 25 seconds .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: have you seen laila bieeu ?
text: officers are concerned for the safety of missing 13-year-old laila bieeu from thorneywood .
nottinghamshire police said she was last seen yesterday at about 13:30 .
she was last seen wearing blue jeans , a black bomber jacket with los angeles written on the back , a yellow t-shirt and white adidas trainers .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forest fan loses cancer battle
text: tributes have been paid to a young nottingham forest fan who has lost his battle with cancer .
dylan barker , 20 , was diagnosed with the disease four times but his family tweeted yesterday that he had died .
forest player barrie mckay held up a shirt in support of dylan after scoring for his team on saturday .

documents.title: driver caught out by funfair arrival
text: a bit of a surprise for martin ross when he went to collect his car from ripley on sunday .
he left it in a car park on saturday night but soon after a funfair arrived and rides were set up around his car .
he was able to get the car out but it was n't without a lot of micky taking from fairground staff .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: buses replacement service during tram maintenance work
text: worth bearing in mind if you are planning to use the trams today .
tram stop then onto - cinderhill - nct bus stop on cinderhill road and then onto bulwell bus station .
from a selfish point of view , i 've enjoyed more trams at bulwell # moretramsplease

author: Maryam Qaiser

documents.title: jimi hendrix love note to be sold
text: a love note , written by jimi hendrix when he was performing in boston in 1967 is to be sold at auction today .
the note , which he wrote to anthea connell is expected to sell for up to £ 3,000 when it goes under the hammer in etwall , derbyshire .
aged 19 , anthea was at boston gliderdrome watching her boyfriend 's band set up on stage when hendrix , who was also due to perform , jumped off the stage and came to talk to her .
i 'd love to say it was a deep and meaningful conversation - i must have mumbled something .
i was totally awestruck .
the star then asked his bandmates for something to write on and returned with a message written on a paper guitar strings packet .
anthea says she wants to sell the note because she 's afraid she 'd lose it , and because it would help her visit her cousin in new zealand .
author: Alex Rhodes
BBC Local Live, Lincolnshire

documents.title: man dies in fire engine crash
text: a 26-year-old man has died after after a crash involving a car and a fire engine in leicester .
it happened early yesterday morning on the southbound carriageway of lubbesthorpe way .
a passenger in the car was taken to hospital in coventry with injuries described as non-life threatening .
police said they 'd like to speak to anyone who was driving in the area and saw the vehicles either before or during the crash .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'huge policing changes ' since death of mother and daughter
text: it 's been 10 years since fiona pilkington killed herself and her 18-year-old disabled daughter , francecca hardwick .
the 38-year-old single mother wrote a suicide note to her mum before dousing the back seat of her car with petrol and setting it alight .
for years the family had been bullied and tormented by groups of youths at their home in barwell .
they complained 33 times to leicestershire police but were only visited by an officer eight times .
an inquest into their deaths found the police failed to act , contributing to fiona 's decision to kill herself and her child .
leicestershire police has told the bbc huge progress in tackling anti-social behaviour has been made in the 10 years since fiona and frankie died .
the death of fiona pilkington and her daughter francecca in 2007 was a terrible tragedy and our sympathies remain with her family and friends 10 years on .
our approach to hate crime and anti-social behaviour has changed beyond all recognition in the last decade .
we take all such reports seriously and in partnership with many agencies do all we can to prevent such crimes happening in the first place . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: parking prices dropped to encourage festive shoppers
text: parking charges have been lowered at two temporary car parks in nottingham to tempt christmas shoppers into the city .
it will cost £ 3 for two hours instead of £ 3.70 and £ 4.50 for four hours instead of £ 6 at broadmarsh east and the sheriff 's lodge - but only if you use parking app ringgo .
the temporary car parks are in place while work is to demolish and rebuild broadmarsh car park continues .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: murder investigation after elderly woman found dead
text: a 56-year-old woman has been arrested on sus of murder after the body of an elderly woman was found at a property in leicester .
the woman was found on thurncourt road in the thurnby lodge area of the city yesterday morning .
a post mortem examination has proved `` inconclusive '' and more tests will be carried out to find out how she died .
police said they 're not looking for anyone else in connection with the death .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bells rung to honour war heroes
text: for the first time this weekend , eight new church bells have been rung at their home in belgium to honour those who died in world war one .
the bells were specially cast at the john taylor & co foundry in loughborough and have been installed at st george 's church in ypres in a project organised by ringing enthusiasts .
it is part of events to mark the 100th anniversary of the end of the conflict .
hundreds turned out for a service to bless them and hear them peal .
author: Amy Harris
Reporter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: man remains in hospital after hit-and-run
text: a 27-year-old man remains in hospital after a `` deliberate '' hit-and-run in ripley .
the man was seriously injured in the crash which happened in derby road on saturday .
officers are looking for a silver audi a4 which they believe was involved , derbyshire police have said .
they said the car would have `` significant damage '' to the front bumper and bonnet .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: car fire causing m1 delays
text: this was the car fire on the m1 near chesterfield earlier this morning .
the exit slip road at junction 29 has now re-opened .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

text: travel : delays in the east midlands

documents.title: join us for today 's live coverage
text: good morning nottinghamshire , derbyshire and leicestershire .
amy woodfield and i will be writing the updates on today 's live page with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us , you can send an email , or use facebook or twitter .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live
